column2: Isuru  Eranga's  evidence  was  further  challenged  based  on  the  Medical  Evidence  in  this  case.  Even
the  Senior State  Counsel  submitted  that  according  to  the  evidence  of the  Doctor,  the  deceased
could  have  sustained  the  fatal  blow  from  behind,  the  Accused-Appellant  challenge  the  above  on  the
ground  that  it  is  not  possible  to  inflict  such  injury  by  the  accused  who  chased  the  deceased  from  her

column1: behind, if Isuru Eranga to be believed.
